commands.description: List all users on the system
List all groups on the system

commands.command: for i in $(cat /etc/passwd 2>/dev/null | cut -d: -f1 2>/dev/null);do id \$i; done 2>/dev/null
commands.description: List all uid's and respective group memberships
Who is currently logged in and what they are doing
Information on when all users last logged in
Information on when the specified user last logged in
Entire list of previously logged on users
